name: Battlezone Remake (Atari)
description:
W/S: Accelerate

A/D: Turn left and right

SPACE: Brake

LMB: Shoot

T: Reset

Made for a IDB GameJam from Indie Dev Brazil Discord, remaking: "Battlezone (Atari)" .The game has had its development interrupted and therefore will not be finalized. There may be bugs or unfinished features.
